40004686.Brief effect description: Performs a Critical Hit when attacking
40004686.Line description: Performs a Critical Hit when attacking

Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Can perform Reversible Exchange with Golden Frieza
- Ki +6 and ATK & DEF 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Attacks are effective against all Types
- High chance of evading enemy's attack
*With a Ki Sphere obtained*
- {passiveImg:once}Fully recovers HP
*When 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team, or
when there is another "Movie Heroes" or "Movie Bosses"
Category ally attacking in the same turn*
- Damage reduction rate 40%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking with 20 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Great chance of performing a critical hit
*When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki*
- ATK 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Performs a critical hit
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 5%{passiveImg:up_g}
- ATK 10%{passiveImg:up_g} and all allies' DEF 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)
when attacking
*For every 5 Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional Super Attack

7976.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Kamehameha
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Raises ATK by 540% temporarily and 
causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
DEF +540% and changes all Ki Spheres 
to TEQ Ki Spheres for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there are 3 or more 
Super Class allies on the team (once only, 
be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
